pages.text: $(l)(Active-Offensive)/$$(br)Mortars select a large area of tiles and then target a set amount of random tiles within that area, dealing 1 damage to each targeted grid. Each mortar has three stats: Length, Width and Amount. The length and Width determine how many tiles are selected the ability (length * width), and the Amount determines how many of those tiles are actually targeted.

Be aware that if you select a tile too close to the edge of the board, the ability may target less tiles than its stats indicate.$(br2)$(l)Tips & Tricks:/$$(li)Mortars can be useful for scouting early on.$(li)When a mortar hits an $(l:abilities/passive/energy_shield)$(thing)Energy Shield/$, it will only deal one damage to the shield regardless of how much of the ability hits the shield.
